item.title: Puppet Syntax highlighting under Textmate
item.description: Add some color to your puppet scripts opened in TextMate! Fire this in a terminal: mkdir -p ~/Application\ Support/TextMate/Bundles git clone https://github.com/masterzen/puppet-textmate-bundle.git Puppet.tmbundle mv Puppet.tmbundle/ ~/Library/Application\ Support/TextMate/Bundles/ rm -fr Puppet.tmbundle And voil√†!
